Description:
Looking for Trainer/Coach to conduct activities for kids ages between 5 & 15 years old, offeringRobotics, CODING & Electronics S.T.E.M. learning sessions, where training material is related to S.T.E.M. Education learning using assembly of hardware & software models while linking to intuitive programs. Delivering multiple levels of Robotics & Electronics activities, in various locations
Coaching Kids from ages 5 to 15, basic up to advanced Robotics
Coaching Kids from ages 5 to 15, basic up to advanced Coding & Programming
Coaching Kids from ages 5 to 15, basic up to intermediate Electronics
Deliver the coaching service by following the preset activity/learning program
Support in developing & improving the activity/learning program
Create & utilize Progress/growth monitoring reports for the kidsDeliver the service through multiple programs such as Afterschool activity, workshops, winter camps, Summer CampsSkills
Skills:
University graduate with Bachelors degree in either : Engineering , Science , Technology, Robotics
Proficiency in English language where English is mother tongue
Speaking and using Arabic language is optional (considered as advantage/favorable)
2+ years Experience in ROBOTICS , CODING , ELECTRONICS
3+ years Experience in teaching / conducting kids activities (considered as advantage/favorable)
Preferred Skills : Proficient knowledge in Robotics, Advanced Coding & Programming ,strong communication , adaptability , enthusiasm to learn & train, patience with Kids
Qatari Driving License
Work visa / Qatar residency

Data.Company Industry: Primary, Prep, & Secondary School; Training & Education Center
